title: Custom Blaster
paragraphs: The Custom Blaster is a main weapon in the Splatoon series. It is the Custom-branded  version of the Blaster, with identical stats.

The Custom Blaster is nearly identical in appearance to the Blaster. The only difference between the two is that the Custom Blaster has a sticker bearing the Custom logo on the front part. In Splatoon 3 the Custom Blaster has two stickers, one on the top and the other on the bottom. The wires have also been changed from red to white.
The Custom Blaster comes in a set with the Point Sensors and Bubbler.

The Custom Blaster returns in Splatoon 2 looking identical to how it did in the first game. It comes with the Autobomb and Inkjet.

The Custom Blaster returns in Splatoon 3 in Chill Season 2023. Its sub weapon is Point Sensor, and its special weapon is Triple Splashdown. The appearance remains almost the same as in the previous two games with a white Custom sticker, but now features white wires connecting to the barrel instead of red, the front sticker being rotated 180 degrees compared to its previous position, and a second additional white Custom sticker placed opposite the original.
